name: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki II: Crimson Sin - Scenario Book Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following:
- Game: The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki II: Crimson Sin
- Original Soundtrack mini
- Trails Series Special Desktop Calendar 2022 to 2023
- Large Microfiber Cloth Map of Calvard Republic
- Downloadable Content BGM Set
- An Entire Scenario Book of "The Legend of Heroes: Kuro no Kiseki"
